meanings.definition: A box for storing or transporting hats.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother keeps her fancy hats in a beautiful hatbox.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new hat and needed a hatbox to keep it safe.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the hatbox was a perfect napping spot.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a hatbox full of memories, each one carefully stored away.
meanings.sent5: The hatbox smelled of lavender and old stories, a treasure chest of elegance.
